researching.name: API Testing Tool (Postman Alternative)
researching.description: Offline-first, Git-native API testing tool for developers frustrated with Postman's pricing and limitations
researching.notes: VERY STRONG demand signals. Multiple competitors (Bruno, Thunder Client) proving market. Pain: Postman free tier limits, slow performance, vendor lock-in. Target: Solo devs + small teams. MVP: Offline HTTP client, Git collections, basic scripting. Monetization: Freemium + team sync $5-10/user/month.
